data.text: Abaho Mafalisayo wayagwe na wafundiza Malagizo ga Musa walawile Yelusalemu wamcholela Yesu wamuuza,
“Habali wanahina zako hawakweleleza mafundizo gatugweleligwe na wahenga zetu? Hawasunha makono gao kamba viilondigwa wang'hali hawanakuja.”
Yesu kawedika, “Habali hamugagoga malagizo ga Imulungu ila mogagoga mafundizo genu wenyego?
Imulungu kalonga, ‘Mtegeleze tatako na mamako na munhu yoyose yonda yamulige tatake hebu mamake kolondigwa yakomigwe.’
Lakini mweye mofundiza, kamba munhu kana kinhu chochose kodaha kumtaza tatake hebu mamake, lakini kolonga, ‘Kinhu kino nimulavila Imulungu.’
Munhu ayo halondigwa kumtegeleza tatake hebu mamake, kwa kutenda avo hamugatonga malagizo ga Imulungu, kwa kukweleleza mafundizo genu wenyego.
Mweye mwa watapitapi! Kumbe mtula ndagu wa Imulungu Isaya kalagula goya mbuli ya mweye!
Imulungu kalonga, ‘Wanhu wano onitegeleza kwa mbuli zao,
Wao onitambikila bule,
Yesu kalukema lunhu lwa wanhu, kalulongela, “Tegelezeni na muvijuwe!
Kuduhu kinhu kingila mmulomo chodaha kumfitiza munhu, lakini kija kilawa mmulomo wa munhu acho kimfitiza munhu.”
Abaho wanahina zake Yesu wamcholela wamuuza, “Vino kuvijuwa kamba Mafalisayo viwahulike mbuli ziulongile wehilwa?”
Yesu kawedika, “Biki jojose hadihandigwe na Tatangu wa kuulanga dong'oligwa.
Sikumuwatonge! Awo vilongozi hawalola wa wanhu hawalola, kamba munhu halola komulongoza munhu halola miyage, wose wabili otumbukila mdikolombo.”
Petulo kamulongela, “Tufambulile ulonzi awo.”
Yesu kawalongela, “Vino na mweye mung'hali hamujuwile?
Mweye hamujuwile bule? Kinhu kingila mmulomo wa munhu chochola mna iinda, abaho cholawa kunze?
Lakini vija vilawa mmulomo, volawa muumoyo, navo vivo vimfitiza munhu.
Kwavija muumoyo wa munhu, mumo mulawa magesa gehile, ubavi, ukomaji, ugoni, kuwalonga wayagwe vihile, uvizi na nzambi.
Vino avo vimfitiza munhu, lakini kuja bila kusunha makono hakumfiza bule munhu.”
Yesu kahalawa hanhu aho kachola mwiimbaka ili behi na kudibuga da Tilo na Sidoni.
Mtwanzi imoja Mkaanani wa isi ayo kamcholela kuno kotowa nyangi, kamulongela, “Go mkulu, Mwana wa Daudi! Nyonele bazi mndele wangu kana kinyamkela komgaza ng'hani.”
Lakini Yesu hamwidike mbuli. Wanahina zake wamcholela Yesu wampula, “Mulongele yasegele! Kwavija kotukweleleza na kotutowela mizangi!”
Yesu kawedika, “Nhumigwa kwa wanhu wa isi ya Izilaeli weli kamba ng'hondolo wapotele.”
Mtwanzi ayo keza kamfugamila kamulongela, “Go mkulu, nhaze!”
Yesu kamwidika, “Havinogile bule kusola ndiya ya iwana na kuwapigisila umbwa.”
Mtwanzi ayo kamwidika, “Ona, go mkulu, lakini hata umbwa oja kija kilagale hasi mmeza ya wakulu zao.”
Yesu kamwidika, “Gweye kwa mtwanzi utamanila ng'hani! Kiulondile kotendiligwa.” Bahaja mndele wake kahona.
Yesu kahalawa hanhu aho, kachola kumgwazo wa lamba da Galilaya. Kakwela kukigongo kakala hasi.
Lunhu lwa wanhu lumcholela na wamgalila wanhu wakalile mbetembete, wasuwameso, walemale, wanhu hawalonga na wanhu wengi watamu, waweka haulongozi wake, nayo kawahonya.
Wanhu wakanganya viwone wanhu hawalonga olonga, walemale wahona, mbetembete otembela na wasuwameso olola, nao wamgwaa nhogolwa Imulungu wa Izilaeli.
Yesu kawakema wanahina zake, kalonga, “Nowonela bazi wanhu wano, kwavija wakala na niye siku ndatu na wabule ndiya. Silonda niwaleke wachole na nzala, sikuwasinduke mnzila.”
Wanahina zake wamuuza, “Hano hatwili twa kuluwala, togapata kwahi magate ga kuwagwaa wanhu wose wano waje?”
Yesu kawauza, “Mna magate mangapi?”
Avo Yesu kawalongela wanhu wakale hasi.
Kasola gamagate saba na waja iwasomba, kamgwaa nhogolwa Imulungu, kagabanzula gamagate, kawagwaa wanahina zake, nao wawagolela wanhu.
Wose waja na kwiguta. Abaho wanahina zake wadondola vija visigale na kumemeza vigelo saba.
Wambigalo wadile wakala elufu nne, watwanzi na wana hawapetigwe bule.
Abaho Yesu kawalaga wanhu, kengila mwiingalawa, kachola mwiisi ya Magadani.
